intro: Berkheya platyptera, commonly known as the flat-leaf berkheya, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Fabaceae and is characterized by its distinctive yellow flowers and broad, flat leaves. The plant typically grows in sandy or rocky soils and thrives in full sun. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its vibrant blooms and unique foliage. Berkheya platyptera is also valued in traditional medicine for its potential health benefits.
